dsaMembership.title: DSA Membership
dsaMembership.subtitle: Join the national Democratic Socialists of America
benefits: National membership with automatic Delaware chapter membership
Sliding scale dues based on income ($27-$130 annually)
Voting rights in Delaware DSA chapter decisions
Full participation in national and local campaigns

duesWaiver.title: Dues Waiver Program
duesWaiver.subtitle: Financial assistance for membership dues
paragraphs: We believe that financial circumstances should never be a barrier to joining DSA. Our dues waiver program provides options for those who cannot afford the standard membership dues.
DSA offers reduced dues options starting at $1/month for those experiencing financial hardship. Delaware DSA can also sponsor memberships for those who cannot afford any dues at all.
To request a dues waiver or sponsorship from Delaware DSA, please contact us using the button below.
